attributes.action: Decriminalize cannabis for personal-use in your own home
attributes.additional_details:
Governments response to "Make the production, sale and use of cannabis legal." 

"Substantial scientific evidence shows cannabis is a harmful drug that can damage human health. There are no plans to legalise cannabis as it would not address the harm to individuals and communities."
attributes.background: Decriminalize Cannabis for personal-use in your own home. Stop wasting police time on low-level 'drug' users, decriminalizing cannabis for home-use would 'allow' cannabis users to use cannabis in a safe environment away from the streets, shop corners and colleges.
